<div type="collation" xml:id="C27"> <anchor type="collate" xml:id="C27"/> <seg sID="C27_app2-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0117__main__1"/> <milestone spanTo="#c57-0117.02" unit="tei:head"/>Chap. 14<shi rend="underline"> </shi> <seg eID="C27_app2-fMS"/> <anchor xml:id="c57-0117.02"/><lb n="c57-0117__main__2"/><anchor xml:id="c57-0117.01"/><lb n="c57-0117__left_margin__1"/>I <seg sID="C27_app5-fMS"/> was <seg eID="C27_app5-fMS"/> soon <seg sID="C27_app7-fMS"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0117__main__d4e21470">int</del> introduced into the presence of the <seg eID="C27_app7-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C27_app8-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0117__main__3"/>Magistrate; <seg eID="C27_app8-fMS"/> an <seg sID="C27_app10-fMS"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0117__main__d4e21475">d</del> old benevolent <seg eID="C27_app10-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C27_app11-fMS"/> man <seg eID="C27_app11-fMS"/> with <lb n="c57-0117__main__4"/>calm & mild manners. <seg sID="C27_app23-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0117__main__7"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0117__main__d4e21506">it was that</del> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0117__main__d4e21509">there were who</del> appeared as <w ana="start"/>wit<lb n="c57-0117__main__8"/>nesses<w ana="end"/> on this <seg eID="C27_app23-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C27_app24-fMS"/> occasion <mod sID="c57-0117__main__d4e21518"/> <mdel>,</mdel> <sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c57-0117__main__d4e21522"/>. <sga-add eID="c57-0117__main__d4e21522"/><mod eID="c57-0117__main__d4e21518"/> <seg eID="C27_app24-fMS"/> about half a dozen <lb n="c57-0117__main__9"/>men came <seg sID="C27_app26-fMS"/> forward <seg eID="C27_app26-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C27_app27-fMS"/> and <seg eID="C27_app27-fMS"/> one being selected <lb n="c57-0117__main__10"/>by the <seg sID="C27_app29-fMS"/> magistrate <seg eID="C27_app29-fMS"/> he <seg sID="C27_app31-fMS"/> deposed <seg eID="C27_app31-fMS"/> that he had been <lb n="c57-0117__main__11"/>out fishing the night before with his son <seg sID="C27_app33-fMS"/> &<lb n="c57-0117__main__12"/>his <seg eID="C27_app33-fMS"/> brother-in-law, Daniel Nugent, <seg sID="C27_app35-fMS"/> when <seg eID="C27_app35-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0117__main__13"/>about <seg sID="C27_app37-fMS"/> nine o clock <seg eID="C27_app37-fMS"/> they observed a strong <lb n="c57-0117__main__14"/>northerly blast <seg sID="C27_app39-fMS"/> rising <seg eID="C27_app39-fMS"/> & they accordingly put <lb n="c57-0117__main__15"/>in for port. It was a very dark <seg sID="C27_app41-fMS"/> night <seg eID="C27_app41-fMS"/> as <lb n="c57-0117__main__16"/>the moon had not yet risen; They did not <seg sID="C27_app43-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0117__main__17"/>lan <mod sID="c57-0117__main__d4e21549"/> <mdel/> <sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c57-0117__main__d4e21557"/>d <sga-add eID="c57-0117__main__d4e21557"/><mod eID="c57-0117__main__d4e21549"/> <seg eID="C27_app43-fMS"/> at the <seg sID="C27_app45-fMS"/> harbour <seg eID="C27_app45-fMS"/> but, as they had been <lb n="c57-0117__main__18"/>accustomed, at a creek about two miles <lb n="c57-0117__main__19"/>below. He <seg sID="C27_app47-fMS"/> went first <seg eID="C27_app47-fMS"/> carrying a part <lb n="c57-0117__main__20"/>of the fishing <seg sID="C27_app49-fMS"/> tackle <seg eID="C27_app49-fMS"/> & his companions <lb n="c57-0117__main__21"/>followed him at some distance. As he <lb n="c57-0117__main__22"/>was <seg sID="C27_app51-fMS"/> walking <seg eID="C27_app51-fMS"/> along the <seg sID="C27_app53-fMS"/> sands <seg eID="C27_app53-fMS"/> he <seg sID="C27_app55-fMS"/> <mod sID="c57-0117__main__d4e21572"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0117__main__d4e21574">hit</del> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0117__main__d4e21577"/>struck <seg eID="C27_app55-fMS"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0117__main__d4e21577"/><mod eID="c57-0117__main__d4e21572"/>his foot <lb n="c57-0117__main__23"/>against <seg sID="C27_app57-fMS"/> somthing <seg eID="C27_app57-fMS"/> & fell <seg sID="C27_app59-fMS"/> all <seg eID="C27_app59-fMS"/> his length on <lb n="c57-0117__main__24"/>the <seg sID="C27_app61-fMS"/> ground; <seg eID="C27_app61-fMS"/> his <seg sID="C27_app63-fMS"/> comrades <seg eID="C27_app63-fMS"/> came up to assist <seg sID="C27_app65-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0117__main__25"/>him & <seg eID="C27_app65-fMS"/> by the light of their <seg sID="C27_app67-fMS"/> lantern <seg eID="C27_app67-fMS"/> they <seg sID="C27_app69-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0117__main__26"/>discovered <seg eID="C27_app69-fMS"/> that he had fallen on the <lb n="c57-0117__main__27"/>body of a <seg sID="C27_app71-fMS"/> man <seg eID="C27_app71-fMS"/> who was to all appearance <lb n="c57-0117__main__28"/>dead. <seg sID="C27_app73-fMS"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <lb n="c57-0117__main__29"/>Their first supposition <seg eID="C27_app73-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C27_app74-fMS"/> was <seg eID="C27_app74-fMS"/> that <lb n="c57-0117__main__30"/>it was the corpse of <seg sID="C27_app76-fMS"/> <mod sID="c57-0117__main__d4e21601"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0117__main__d4e21603">man</del> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0117__main__d4e21606"/>some person <seg eID="C27_app76-fMS"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0117__main__d4e21606"/><mod eID="c57-0117__main__d4e21601"/>who had been <seg sID="C27_app78-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0117__main__31"/>drowned <seg eID="C27_app78-fMS"/> & thrown on shore by the <seg sID="C27_app82-fMS"/> waves, <lb n="c57-0117__main__32"/>But <seg eID="C27_app82-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C27_app83-fMS"/> upon <seg eID="C27_app83-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C27_app84-fMS"/> examination <seg eID="C27_app84-fMS"/> they found that <lb n="c57-0117__main__33"/>the clothes were not <seg sID="C27_app86-fMS"/> wet <seg eID="C27_app86-fMS"/> &<mod sID="c57-0117__main__d4e21617"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0117__main__d4e21619"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark><sga-add eID="c57-0117__main__d4e21619"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0117__main__d4e21625"/>even <sga-add eID="c57-0117__main__d4e21625"/><mod eID="c57-0117__main__d4e21617"/>that the body <lb n="c57-0117__main__34"/>was not <seg sID="C27_app90-fMS"/> yet <seg eID="C27_app90-fMS"/> cold. They instantly carried <lb n="c57-0117__main__35"/>it to the cottage of an old woman <lb n="c57-0117__main__36"/>near <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0117__main__d4e21635"/>the <seg sID="C27_app92-fMS"/> spot <seg eID="C27_app92-fMS"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0117__main__d4e21635"/>& <seg sID="C27_app94-fMS"/> endeavoured <mod sID="c57-0117__main__d4e21638"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0117__main__d4e21640"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <seg eID="C27_app94-fMS"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0117__main__d4e21640"/><sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0117__main__d4e21646"/>but in <seg sID="C27_app96-fMS"/> vain <sga-add eID="c57-0117__main__d4e21646"/><mod eID="c57-0117__main__d4e21638"/> <seg eID="C27_app96-fMS"/> to restore it to <seg sID="C27_app98-fMS"/> life <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0117__main__d4e21651">but</del> <lb n="c57-0118__main__1"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0118__main__d4e21664">In vain</del> . <seg eID="C27_app98-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C27_app99-fMS"/> He <seg eID="C27_app99-fMS"/> appeared to <seg sID="C27_app101-fMS"/> have been <seg eID="C27_app101-fMS"/> a handsome <lb n="c57-0118__main__2"/>young <seg sID="C27_app103-fMS"/> man <seg eID="C27_app103-fMS"/> about twenty years of age. He <lb n="c57-0118__main__3"/>had apparently been <seg sID="C27_app107-fMS"/> strangled <seg eID="C27_app107-fMS"/> for there <lb n="c57-0118__main__4"/><anchor xml:id="c57-0118.01"/><lb n="c57-0118__left_margin__1"/><sga-add hand="#pbs" sID="c57-0118__left_margin__d4e21680"/>was <sga-add eID="c57-0118__left_margin__d4e21680"/>no sign of any <seg sID="C27_app109-fMS"/> violence <seg eID="C27_app109-fMS"/> except the black <lb n="c57-0118__main__5"/>mark of fingers on his neck. <milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <lb n="c57-0118__main__6"/>The first <seg sID="C27_app111-fMS"/> <mod sID="c57-0118__main__d4e21690"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0118__main__d4e21692"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c57-0118__main__d4e21692"/><sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0118__main__d4e21698"/>part <seg eID="C27_app111-fMS"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0118__main__d4e21698"/><mod eID="c57-0118__main__d4e21690"/>of this deposition did not <lb n="c57-0118__main__7"/>in the least <seg sID="C27_app113-fMS"/> interrest me <seg eID="C27_app113-fMS"/> but when the <lb n="c57-0118__main__8"/>mark of the fingers was <seg sID="C27_app115-fMS"/> mentioned <seg eID="C27_app115-fMS"/> I <w ana="start"/>remem<lb n="c57-0118__main__9"/>bered<w ana="end"/> the <seg sID="C27_app117-fMS"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0118__main__d4e21713">the</del> murder of my <seg eID="C27_app117-fMS"/>
